channel.title: How to Fake you friends tyre Poped - The fun way
channel.description:
For the Trick you will need Tape (any kind) A balloon And your friends car
Note:Before you do this make sure your friend will have to reverse ( so the car is on the drive way or something) Ok, first off go to your friends car and blow up the ballon Now, tape the balloon to any of the front tyres ( so your victem cant see it) So when your victem uses his/her car and they reverse out of there driveway they should hear a POP
- Not much but if it works your friend should get out there car and start looking around..

item.title: How to Fake you friends tyre Poped - The fun way
item.dc:creator: @mikkomainer Secet
item.description:
@mikkomainer wrote:

[quote=“magma828, post:1, topic:224487”][quote author=Secet link=topic=294033.msg2371146#msg2371146 date=1218234652]

I’m not sure if it would work, never tested it. But I have to try it sometime.

I wouldn’t like to be the person to see what happens when cutting open an aerosol bottle…

You just need to empty all propellent gas from it and then make a hole with nail or something, then you can cut it.
[/quote]

It could even explode in the freezer if the particals acted in a strange way. You just wouldn’t know until after trying it, although it does sound like a good idea.[/quote]
Yea that might happen, and it might not freeze at all. Gonna test it next winter.

Read full topic
item.source: How to Fake you friends tyre Poped - The fun way

item.title: How to Fake you friends tyre Poped - The fun way
item.dc:creator: @mikkomainer Secet
item.description:
@mikkomainer wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:3, topic:223853”]Weak man.

Firecrackers in glove box = epic win.[/quote]

We had a nice idea with my work mate few days ago. Too bad we haven’t found any good victim for this yet, or any dickhead.

First you would put shaving bottle (Those which you shake, aerosol bottle, foam, I don’t know the right word for it.) in freezer, or if it’s winter just put it outside.
After it’s frozen carefully cut it open and take the frozen “foam”.
Next you need to place it in victims glove box, and then wait them to put heater on.
When tempature gets higher foam starts to defrost and it should result in lots of foam in car. :o

I’m not sure if it would work, never tested it. But I have to try it sometime.

Read full topic
